channel.title: Implicit Bias on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 27, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the unfaithfulness of Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning in LLMs, highlighting issues like implicit biases and logically contradictory outputs, which pose challenges for AI safety monitoring.
